turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: order from Starbucks Spruce Street in Philadelphia.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm looking to get a grande coffee latte and I will prefer soy milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, yeah. That sounds good. Go ahead.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: from what store are you picking it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: going to be the Starbucks on Spruce Street in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so your order is: grande latte with soy milk and whipped cream, is this correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks at spruce street.
